rooms.name: TheNorthPole_Orientation
rooms.description: You have arrived at the entry point to this year’s KringleCon. In front of you you can see a green fence.

objectives.name: JingleRingford
objectives.description: an Elf standing next to a Terminal for "Objective 1 - KringleCon Orientation"

rooms.name: TheNorthPole_TheNorthPole
rooms.description: You are standing in the main location of this year’s KringleCon and FrostFest. At the left side you can see the KringleCon building, at the right side there is the Frostfest tower.

objectives.name: GreasyGopherGuts
objectives.description: a Troll standing next to a Terminal called "Greping for Gold"

objectives.name: NoelBoetie
objectives.description: an Elf standing next to a Terminal called "Logic Munchers"

characters.name: Santa
characters.description: standing in the middle of the room surrounded by the pigeons

characters.name: Jack Frost
characters.description: waiting in front of the Frost tower

rooms.name: KringleCon_Entry
rooms.description: You have entered the entry room of the KringleCon. At the left side there is a festive Christmas tree, at the right side there is an elevator. A few pictures are hanging at the walls.

rooms.name: KringleCon_DiningRoom
rooms.description: You are standing in the dining room. A huge wooden table is located at the center. A few pictures are hanging at the walls.

rooms.name: KringleCon_GreatRoom
rooms.description: You have entered the great room. The whole floor is covered by a huge carpet. Pictures are covering the walls.

rooms.name: KringleCon_Kitchen
rooms.description: You have found the kitchen. At the left side you can see the kitchen block. At the right side there is another festive Christmas tree.

rooms.name: KringleCon_Courtyard
rooms.description: You have entered the court yard. A few logs are burning in the center area. Around the burning woods you can see a few booths.

characters.name: Cyberus
characters.description: a three-headed dog standing between the booths

rooms.name: KringleCon_TalksLobby
rooms.description: You have reached the talks lobby.

rooms.name: KringleCon_SpeakerUNpreparationRoom
rooms.description: You have found the speaker UNpreparation room. Next to the christmas tree located at the right side you can see a vending machine offering drinks and snacks.

rooms.name: KringleCon_SantasOffice
rooms.description: You just discovered Santa’s office. At the right side you can see a globe and a knight statue.

rooms.name: KringleCon_NetWars
rooms.description: You have reached the top of the building where NetWars is talking place. A lot of participants are competing here against each other.

rooms.name: FrostFest_FrostTowerLobby
rooms.description: You have reached the lobby. A lot of people are playing at the casino machines. In front of you there is the elevator.

rooms.name: FrostFest_JacksStudio
rooms.description: You take a step into Jack’s studio. In front of you you can see some paintings.

rooms.name: FrostFest_JacksOffice
rooms.description: You have reached Jack’s office. In front of you there are the elevators. At the left side you can see a huge Jack statue.

rooms.name: FrostFest_JacksRestroom
rooms.description: Wow. Is this really Jack’s restroom? The toilet in front of you must have been made of pure gold, the sink at the right side must be pure gold as well.

rooms.name: FrostFest_FrostTowerGiftShop
rooms.description: You have reached Jack’s gift shop. You can see a lot of merchandise. There are t-shirts and puppets everywhere!

characters.name: Jack Frost
characters.description: trying to sell all that merchandise

rooms.name: FrostFest_FrostTowerRooftop
rooms.description: You are standing right at the Frost towers rooftop. The stairs are located at the right side. At the left side you can see an U.F.O. Has it been here all the time?

rooms.name: FrostFest_TalksLobby
rooms.description: You have reached the talks lobby.

rooms.name: FrostFest_TheThirdKind
rooms.description: You dare to enter the U.F.O. It is very dark here. At the left side there is a huge screen showing a video call to Santa himself.
